title: ResponseConfig
description: Config file for various tracker responses to actions that happen

StartedTracking.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker starts.

StartingTrackingAlternate.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker starts in "alternate" mode.

StoppedTracking.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker stops.

StoppedTrackingPostGoMode.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker stops after go mode has been turned on.

Misheard.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when speech recognition confidence does not meet the configured threshold for execution, but is high enough to be recognized.

TrackedItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a simple single-stage item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

TrackedTwoItems.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking two items at once. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the first item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the second item.

TrackedThreeItems.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking three items at once. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the first item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the second item. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the third item.

TrackedManyItems.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking more than three items 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the first item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the second item. 
{2} is the number of remaining items tracked.

TrackedItemByStage.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a progressive item using a specific stage name. 
{0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), 
{1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

TrackedItemMultiple.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item that can be tracked multiple times. 
{0} is a placeholder for the plural item name. 
{1} is a placeholder for the number of copies.

TrackedProgressiveItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a progressive item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), 
{1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

TrackedOlderProgressiveItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a lower tier of an item than you already have, e.g. tracking Master Sword when you have the Tempered Sword. 
{0} is a placeholder for the base item name (e.g. Sword), 
{1} is a placeholder for the current stage of the progressive item (e.g. Master Sword).

TrackedTooManyOfAnItem.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item that is already at the max tier.

TrackedAlreadyTrackedItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking a single-stage item that is already tracked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

TrackedVanillaItem.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item that is at its correct location according to the original game.

TrackedExactAmountDuplicate.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when setting the exact amount of an item, but that exact amount is already tracked. 
{0} is the plural name of the item. 
{1} is the number of items.

TrackedMultipleItems.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking multiple items in an area at once.

ClearedMultipleItems.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing multiple items in an area at once.

TrackedNothing.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking or clearing multiple items in an area at once, but there no items left. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

TrackedNothingOutOfLogic.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking or clearing multiple items in an area at once, but the only items left are out of logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area. 
{1} is a placeholder for the number of items that are left but inaccessible.

UntrackedItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

TrackedOutOfLogicItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with after tracking an item that is not in logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item was tracked. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location that contains the item that is out of logic. 
{2} is a placeholder for one or more names of required items that are missing.

TrackedOutOfLogicItemTooManyMissing.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with after tracking an item that is not in logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item was tracked. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location that contains the item that is out of logic.

UntrackedNothing.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that hasn't been tracked yet. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

UntrackedProgressiveItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that has multiple stages. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

UntrackedItemMultiple.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking an item that can be tracked multiple times. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

UntrackedItemMultipleLast.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when untracking the last copy of an item that can be tracked multiple times. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item with "a"/"the".

ShaktoolAvailable.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when Shaktool becomes available.

PegWorldAvailable.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when Peg World becomes available.

PegWorldModeOn.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when Peg World mode is toggled on.

PegWorldModePegged.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when pegging a Peg World peg.

PegWorldModePeggedMultiple.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when auto-tracking multiple Peg World pegs. Tracker will use the responses for the largest number less than the number of pegs.

PegWorldModeDone.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when all Peg World pegs have been pegged or Peg World mode is toggled off manually.

DungeonRewardMarked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the reward at a dungeon. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the reward that was marked.

RemainingDungeonsMarked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the reward for all other unmarked dungeons. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the reward that was marked.

NoRemainingDungeons.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when there are no unmarked dungeons.

DungeonCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing all locations in a dungeon. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

DungeonAlreadyCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing all location in a dungeon, but all locations are already cleared. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

DungeonClearedWithInaccessibleItems.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing all locations in a dungeon, but some of the cleared locations were out of logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of a location that was missed. 
{2} is a placeholder for the items that are required for a missed location.

DungeonClearedWithTooManyInaccessibleIte.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing all locations in a dungeon, but some of the cleared locations were out of logic with too many missing items. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of a location that was missed.

DungeonBossCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing a dungeon. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon that was cleared. 
{1} is a placeholder for the boss of the dungeon.

DungeonBossAlreadyCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing a dungeon that was already cleared. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon that was cleared. 
{1} is a placeholder for the boss of the dungeon.

DungeonBossUncleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when reverting the cleared status of a dungeon. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the boss of the dungeon.

DungeonBossNotYetCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when reverting the cleared status of a dungeon that wasn't cleared yet. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the boss of the dungeon.

DungeonBossClearedAddContent.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the player defeated a boss with remarkable skill and add content!

DungeonRequirementMarked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the medallion requirement of a dungeon. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

DungeonRequirementInvalid.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking the wrong dungeon with a required medallion. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon.

DungeonRequirementMismatch.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking a dungeon with a requirement that doesn't match the seed logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion in the seed. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the medallion that was tracked.

DungeonTreasureTracked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking treasure in a dungeon. The dictionary key represents the amount of items left, where 2 is 2 or more and -1 is when the dungeon is already empty. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is the amount of items left after tracking.

DungeonTooManyTreasuresTracked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing more treasure chests in a dungeon than there are left. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is the actual amount of items left. 
{2} is the amount of items requested to clear.

ItemTrackedInIncorrectDungeon.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item in a specific dungeon, but that dungeon does not have that item in the seed. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the dungeon. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a" or "the", as appropriate.

LocationMarked.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item at a location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

LocationMarkedAgain.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item at a location that has already been marked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the item that was previously marked here.

LocationMarkedAsBullshit.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item as nothing/bullshit. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationMarkedPreConfigured.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking an item at a location that was preconfigured. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location.

TrackedPreConfigured.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking an item at a location that was preconfigured. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationHasDifferentItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking or tracking an item at a location, when the seed contains a different item at the same location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the item that was tracked or marked. 
{1} is a placeholder for the item that was in the same location in the seed.

LocationCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing a location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationsCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing multiple locations. 
{0} is a placeholder for the number of locations.

NoMarkedLocations.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when trying to clear the last marked locations when there aren't any

LocationsClearedSameRegion.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when clearing multiple locations from the same region. 
{0} is a placeholder for the number of locations. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the region

GoModePrompts.description: Gets the phrases to request tracker to initiate go mode

GoModeToggledOff.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when undoing Go Mode.

AreaDoesNotHaveItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when attempting to track or clear an item in an area that does not have that item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a"/"the".

AreaHasMoreThanOneItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when attempting to track or clear an item in an area that has multiple copies of that item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a"/"the".

TrackedUselessItem.description: Gets the phrases to respond with after tracking an item that doesn't open up new areas.

CountHyperBeamShots.description: Responses based on how many Hyper Beam shots it took to defeat Mother Brain. Tracker will use the responses for the largest number less than the number of shots. The max is 36.

Error.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when an internal error occurs.

ActionUndone.description: Gets the phrases to respond with before undoing the last action.

NothingToUndo.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when there is nothing to undo.

UndoExpired.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the latest undo action has expired

TrackerSettingChanged.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when changing a Tracker setting. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the setting that was changed. 
{1} is a placeholder for the new value.

BossDefeated.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking a boss as defeated. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the boss.

BossAlreadyDefeated.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when marking a boss as defeated who was already marked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the boss.

BossUndefeated.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when un-marking a boss as defeated. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the boss.

BossNotYetDefeated.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when un-marking a boss as defeated who hasn't been defeated yet. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the boss.

TimerResumed.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the timer is resumed

TimerReset.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the timer is reset

TimerPaused.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the timer is paused

Muted.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker is muted

Unmuted.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracker is unmuted

BeatGame.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the game is beaten

Idle.description: Gets a dictionary that contains the phrases to respond with when no voice commands have been issued after a certain period of time, as expressed in the dictionary keys.

Hints.description: Gets the configured phrases for hints.

Spoilers.description: Gets the configured phrases for spoilers.

Chat.description: Gets the configured phrases for chat integration.

AutoTracker.description: Gets the configured phrases for auto tracking.

Map.description: Gets the configured phrases for the map

Cheats.description: Gets the configured phrases for cheats

Multiplayer.description: Gets the configured phrases for multiplayer

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.

EnabledHints.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when hints are turned on.

DisabledHints.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when hints are turned off.

PromptEnableItemHints.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when asked about an item and hints are turned off.

PromptEnableLocationHints.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when asked about a location and hints are turned off.

NoApplicableHints.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when there are no applicable hints for the item or location that was asked about.

PlaythroughImpossible.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when asked about hints on a seed where a complete playthrough is likely impossible.

ItemNotInLogic.description:
Gets the hints for items that are not in logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInSuperMetroid.description:
Gets the hints for items that are only found in Super Metroid. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInALttP.description:
Gets the hints for items that are only found in A Link to the Past. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemRequiresOtherItem.description:
Gets the hints for items that are not in logic and mention one or more missing items. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name(s) of the missing item(s).

ItemRequiresManyOtherItems.description:
Gets the hints for items that are not in logic and require too many items to mention. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemNotInArea.description:
Gets the hints for items that are not found in the specified region or area. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the region/area.

ItemInSphereZero.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in playthrough sphere zero. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInEarlySphere.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in an early sphere. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInLateSphere.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in a late sphere. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInPreviouslyVisitedDungeon.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in a dungeon that has been visited already. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInUnvisitedDungeon.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in a dungeon that has not yet been visited before. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInPreviouslyVisitedRegion.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in a region that has been visited already. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemInUnvisitedRegion.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in a region that has not been visited yet. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemHasBadVanillaLocationName.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in locations that have a bad name in the original randomizer. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location in the original randomizer code.

ItemIsInVanillaJunkLocation.description:
Gets the hints for items that are in locations which have junk items in the vanilla game. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the vanilla item in the same location.

LocationAlreadyCleared.description:
Gets the hints for locations that have been cleared already. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationAlreadyClearedSpoiler.description:
Gets the hints for locations that have been cleared already. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item at the location.

LocationHasJunkItem.description:
Gets the hints for locations that don't have anything useful. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationHasUsefulItem.description:
Gets the hints for locations that might have something useful. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location.

LocationHasSuperMetroidItem.description:
Gets the hints for locations that have an item from Super Metroid. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the sprite that replaces Samus, or "Samus".

LocationHasZeldaItem.description:
Gets the hints for locations that have an item from A Link to the Past. 
{0} is placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the sprite that replaces Link, or "Link".

AreaSuggestion.description:
Gets the suggestions for areas to visit. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area that has a progression item.

BookHint.description:
Gets the hint that describes an item by the text that would be shown when using the Book of Mudora. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the text that would be displayed when using the Book of Mudora. 
{2} is the name of the Book of Mudora, including "the".

AreaAlreadyCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when asking for hints about an area that was already cleared. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

AreaHasSomethingMandatory.description:
Gets the hint to give for an area that has one or more useful items. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

AreaHasSomethingGood.description:
Gets the hint to give for an area that might have one or more useful items. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

AreaHasJunk.description:
Gets the hint to give for an area that only has junk items left. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

AreaHasJunkAndCrystal.description:
Gets the hint to give for an area that only has junk items left, but also has a crystal as reward for beating the boss. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

AreaWorthComplicated.description:
Gets the hint to give for an area whose worth is complicated, e.g. when a dungeon has only junk and is not a crystal dungeon, but the pendant might result in something good. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the area.

ItemInUnknownWorld.description:
Gets the hint to give for an item that is in another world, but does not mention the specific player 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

ItemInPlayerWorld.description:
Gets the hint to give for an item that is in another world, mentioning the player name 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the player.

ItemInPlayerWorldALttP.description:
Gets the hint to give for an item that is in another player's ALttP world 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the player.

ItemInPlayerWorldSuperMetroid.description:
Gets the hint to give for an item that is in another player's SM world 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the player.

ItemInPlayerWorldRegionRoomPrefixHint.description:
When giving a hint for a specific region or room, this states which player the hint belongs to 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the player.

EnabledSpoilers.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when spoilers are turned on.

DisabledSpoilers.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when spoilers are turned off.

PromptEnableItemSpoilers.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when asked about an item and spoilers are disabled.

PromptEnableLocationSpoilers.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when asked about a location and spoilers are disabled.

TrackedAllItemsAlready.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when asking about an item that is already at the highest stage. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item.

TrackedItemAlready.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when asking about an item that has already been tracked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, including "a", "an" or "the".

MarkedItem.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when asking about an item that has been marked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

MarkedLocation.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when asking about a location whose item has already been marked. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the marked item, with "a", "an" or "the".

EmptyLocation.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the location that was asked about did not have an item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location.

ItemNotFound.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the item could not be found. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemsNotFound.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when no instances of an item could be found anymore. 
{0} is a placeholder for the plural name of the item.

LocationsCleared.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when all locations that have the item are cleared. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

LocationHasItem.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the item that is at the requested location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

LocationHasItemOtherWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the item that is at the requested when in a multiworld game and the item belongs to another player location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 2 is a placeholder for the name of the player the item belongs to

LocationHasItemOwnWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the item that is at the requested when in a multiworld game and the item belongs to the local player location. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

LocationHasUnknownItem.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the item that is at the requested location, when the item does not exist in the item data. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the".

ItemIsAtLocation.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemIsAtLocationOtherWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item and that location is in another world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region. 3 is a placeholder for the name of the player for that location's world.

ItemIsAtLocationOwnWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item and that location is in the local world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsAreAtLocation.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsAreAtLocationOtherWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item and that location is in another world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region. 3 is a placeholder for the name of the player for that location's world.

ItemsAreAtLocationOwnWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item and that location is in the local world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemIsAtOutOfLogicLocation.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemIsAtOutOfLogicLocationOtherWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic and in another player's world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemIsAtOutOfLogicLocationOwnWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil the location that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic and is in the local world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsAreAtOutOfLogicLocation.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsAreAtOutOfLogicLocationOtherWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic and in another player's world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsAreAtOutOfLogicLocationOwnWorld.description:
Gets the phrases that spoil one of the locations that has the requested item, but the location is out of logic and is in the local world. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the item, with "a", "an" or "the". 
{1} is a placeholder for the name of the location. 
{2} is a placeholder for the name of the region.

ItemsInArea.description:
Gets the phrases that mention all the items in an area. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the room or region. 
{1} is a placeholder for the names of the items left.

ChatConfig.description: Provides the phrases for chat integration.

RecognizedGreetings.description: Gets a collection of greetings that tracker recognizes and responds to.

WhenConnected.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when connected to chat.

WhenDisconnected.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when disconnected to chat.

NoConnection.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when disconnected to chat.

GreetingResponses.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when greeted by someone in chat. 
{0} is a placeholder for the display name of the person in chat to respond to.

GreetedTwice.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when greeting someone for the second time in chat. 
{0} is a placeholder for the display name of the person in chat to respond to.

GreetedChannel.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when greeted by the broadcaster. 
{0} is a placeholder for the display name of the person in chat to respond to.

StartedGuessingGame.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when starting the GT big key guessing game.

ClosedGuessingGame.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when closing guesses for the GT big key guessing game.

ModeratorClosedGuessingGame.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when a moderator closed guesses for the GT big key guessing game. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the moderator that triggered the close.

ClosedGuessingGameWhileClosed.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the guessing game is closed subsequent times.

ClosedGuessingGameBeforeStarting.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the guessing game is closed before it was started.

ModeratorClosedGuessingGameWhileClosed.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when a moderator closed the guessing game when it has already been closed. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the moderator that triggered the close.

ModeratorClosedGuessingGameBeforeStartin.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when a moderator closed the guessing game when it hasn't even started yet. 
{0} is a placeholder for the name of the moderator that triggered the close.

DeclareGuessingGameWinners.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the guessing game has concluded. 
{0} is a placeholder for the correct number. 
{1} is a placeholder for the names of the winners.

DeclareGuessingGameClosestButNotOverWinn.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the guessing game has concluded. 
{0} is a placeholder for the correct number. 
{1} is a placeholder for the guessed number, 
{2} is a placeholder for the names of the winners.

NobodyWonGuessingGame.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the guessing game has concluded and nobody won. 
{0} is a placeholder for the correct number.

TrackerGuess.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when Tracker submits her own guess for the guessing game. 
{0} is a placeholder for the number that Tracker guessed.

TrackerGuessWon.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when Tracker is among the list of winners that were just announced. 
{0} is a placeholder for the correct number.

TrackerGuessOnlyWinner.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when Tracker is the only winner of the guessing game. 
{0} is a placeholder for the correct number.

TrackerGuessFailed.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the chest that Tracker guessed was opened and did not contain the big key.

UserNamePronunciation.description: Gets a dictionary that contains usernames and their replacement for text-to-speech pronunciation purposes.

AskChatAboutContent.description: Gets the phrases for when asking the chat if content should be increased or not

AskChatAboutContentYes.description: Gets the phrases for when chat decided to increase content

AskChatAboutContentNo.description: Gets the phrases for when chat decided not to increase content

PollComplete.description: Gets the phrases for when the poll is complete

PollOpened.description: Gets the phrases for when the poll is opened

PollError.description: Gets the phrases for when the poll outcome could not be determined

AutoTrackerConfig.description: Provides the phrases for chat integration.

WhenConnected.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when connected to to emulator.

WhenDisconnected.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when disconnected from the emulator.

GameStarted.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the game is started.

GameStartedMultiplayer.description:
Gets the phrases to respond with when the game is started in a multiplayer game. 
{0} is a placeholder for the number of players. 
{1} is a placeholder for a random player name.

NearKraidsAwfulSon.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when nearing KAD

NearShaktool.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when nearing shaktool

NearCrocomire.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when nearing crocomire

AtCrumbleShaft.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when at crumble shaft

FallFromMoldorm.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when falling down the pit from moldorm

FallFromGTMoldorm.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when falling down the pit from moldorm in GT

FallFromGanon.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when falling down the pit from moldorm

HeraPot.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when performing Hera Pot tech

IceBreaker.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when performing Ice Breaker tech

SpeckyClip.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when performing Specky Clip

DiverDown.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when performing Diver Down tech

EnterHyruleCastleTower.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when entering Hyrule Castle tower

EnterPendantDungeon.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when entering a pendant dungeon

FakeFlippers.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when swimming without flippers

MockBall.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when performing mockball

LookedAtNothing.description: Player asked auto tracker to look at something, but there was nothing

DarkWorldNoMedallions.description: Misery Mire and Turtle Rock have pendants

GTKeyIsItemOne.description: Big Key is the first item found by the player in GT

GTKeyIsItemTwoToSeven.description: Big key was the second to seventh item found by the player in GT

GTKeyIsItemEightToFifteen.description: Big key was the eighth to fifteenth item found by the player in GT

GTKeyIsItemSixteenToTwentyOne.description: Big key was the sixteenth to twenty first item found by the player in GT

GTKeyIsItemTwentyTwo.description: Big key was the twenty second item found by the player in GT

GTKeyResponses.description: Responses based on what number the GT key was. Tracker will use the responses for the largest number less than the number of the GT key.

SwitchedToSMZ3Rom.description: Auto tracker detected switching to SMZ3

SwitchedToOtherRom.description: Responses for changing to a game other than SMZ3. The key represents the hash of the rom that is being switched to. For any hashes that aren't found, the responses for SwitchedToOtherRom["Unknown"] is used.

UpdateMap.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when showing the player a dark room map

ShowDarkRoomMap.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when showing the player a dark room map

NotInDarkRoom.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the player asks for a dark room map but they're not in one

HideDarkRoomMap.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when hiding a dark room map

NoPrevDarkRoomMap.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when hiding a dark room map but there was no previous map

HasLamp.description: Gets the phrases to respond with saying that they can't see but have the lamp

EnabledCheats.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when cheats are turned on.

DisabledCheats.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when cheats are turned off.

PromptEnableCheats.description: Gets the phrases to respond when a cheat command is given and cheats are turned off

PromptEnableAutoTracker.description: Gets the phrases to respond when a cheat command is given and auto tracker is not connected

CheatPerformed.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when connected to to emulator.

CheatFailed.description: Gets the phrases to respond when the player can't perform a certain cheat.

CheatInvalidItem.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the player tries to cheat themselves an item that does not exist.

MultiplayerConfig.description: Provides the phrases for playing multiplayer

OtherPlayerTrackedItem.description:
Gets the phrases for when another player tracks a useful item the local player does not have 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name 
{1} is a placeholder for the item name 
{2} is a placeholder for the item name prefixed by an article

OtherPlayerClearedDungeonWithReward.description:
Gets the phrases for when another player clears a dungeon 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name 
{1} is a placeholder for the dungeon name 
{2} is a placeholder for the dungeon boss name 
{3} is a placeholder for the reward name 
{4} is a placeholder for the reward name prefixed by an article

OtherPlayerClearedDungeonWithoutReward.description:
Gets the phrases for when another player clears a dungeon 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name 
{1} is a placeholder for the dungeon name 
{2} is a placeholder for the dungeon boss name

OtherPlayerDefeatedBoss.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player defeats a golden boss in SM 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name 
{1} is a placeholder for the boss name

OtherPlayedDied.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player dies 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name

OtherPlayedDiedDeathLink.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player dies and death link is enabled 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name

OtherPlayerBeatGame.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player beats the game by defeating both Ganon and Mother Brain before the local player has completed or forfeited. 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name

OtherPlayerBeatGameNoItems.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player beats the game by defeating both Ganon and Mother Brain before the local player has completed for forfeited, but the local player isn't getting any items 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name

OtherPlayerForfeitGame.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player forfeits from the game 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name

GiftedUsefulItemToOtherPlayer.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player gets an item that is for another player 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name the item is being gifted to 
{1} is a placeholder for the item name 
{2} is a placeholder for the item name prefixed by an article

ReceivedUsefulItemFromOtherPlayer.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player receives a potentially progression item from another player 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name the item is being gifted from 
{1} is a placeholder for the item name 
{2} is a placeholder for the item name prefixed by an article

ReceivedJunkItemFromOtherPlayer.description:
Gets the phrases to respond when a player receives a junk item from another player 
{0} is a placeholder for the player name the item is being gifted from 
{1} is a placeholder for the item name 
{2} is a placeholder for the item name prefixed by an article
